host: Meditate together and become friends - Taipei
title: How does Meditation function?
location: Taipei Zhong He, near MRT JingAn - JingpPing Rd 493, Taipei
description: After a brief introduction we experience how meditation functions using the guided 16th Karmapa Meditation (3-Light-Meditation) It is the basic practise in over 700 Diamondway-Buddhism groups and centers world wide. This skilful method directly points to the the Pure View of Awareness and identification with one´s Buddha-Nature under all life situations - suitable for everyone with an active lifestyle including work, relationships, family, creativity or whatever one has to do. The meditations used in Diamondway are traditional practices of the Karma Kagyu lineage of Tibetan Buddhism. They were transmitted to Lama Ole Nydahl by various masters of the Lineage, notably by the 16th Karmapa Rangjung Rigpe Dorje and translated to different languages to give a direct access and understanding to Buddhist students all over the world. Head of the Karmapa Kagyu Linage is now the 17th Karmapa Thaye Dorje.More information also about other centres worldwide check out: www.diamondway-buddhism.orgHere in Taipei we are a group of friends meeting in a private setting regularly.Only requirement: please be on time, thats all. Meditation and explanations are given in English, Chinese translation available , with a brief introduction and time to get to know each other  - ENJOY!

title: Yushan / Jade Mountain 1 Day Ascent (Grade B Hiking Level)
location: Yushan National Park - Yushan National Park, Nantou County
description: Hi, anyone here interested joining hiking Yushan / Jade mountain for 1 day during weekend in mid December?Yushan as the highest mountain in Taiwan (+-3952) also in East Asia has been gaining reputation as the most popular mountain to hike in Taiwan. To get the the permit and stay at Paiyun Lodge is a nightmare, since there will be around 2-5 thousand applicants fighting for 100 +- space available and also +- 20 for daily single day hiking quota. Hopefully, we can slip one application and get the permit.Pre requirement:  Yushan Main Peak trail is 11 km long +- 2km distance from Yushan Visitor Center to Trailhead.  Starting at 2400 masl it gains 1600 m altitude to the Main Peak. Altitude sickness is common symptom for those who never had any experience hiking above 3000 masl, thus physical ability must be well prepared prior hiking, moreover, to apply permit for single day ascent requires to submit picture of experience hiking a mountain above 3000 masl.1 team is maximum 5 person, including me, there will be only 4 spaces left.Edit[masked] the team has been full, anyone who is submitting data form will be on waiting list.How to Join,  Fill the form at this link https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rjzM5y3ZMHtwsDRw-WqwtlRYONdfhghUorzPALLVYgI , and submit your data, including the picture mentioned above as link or email attachment, deadline is November 4th. If you are eligible for this hike, I will notice you via email.  The member will be chosen by first come first serve method, and considering hiking experience. No last minute cancellation, 2 days prior deadline is maximum time to withdraw, otherwise I will ask admin for permanent ban.  Once selected as team member of this hike, i will give you my bank account, there will be 2 days to complete the payment. This payment is non refundable. Unless I cannot secure the permit, I will either change the date, or refund 100 percent.Fee  NTD 1500, included transportation from meeting point in Taoyuan - Zhongli, to Tataka and bunk bed at Dongpu Hostel (NTD 300).  not included Food and Insurance.  Please note that I will rent a car for 2 days, buy gas, also drive it myself, thus I can get this price, so please don't make assumption I become a tour guide :).Itinerary  Day 1, (Saturday)  08.00 meet up at Zhongli (place To be decided)  09.00 Departure to Yushan National Park  13.30 Check in at Dongpu Hostel, rest, lunch and dinnerDay 2, (Sunday)  02.00 Wake up, and Start the hike  06.30 Arrive at Paiyun Lodge  08.00 Arrive at Yushan Summit  09.00 Descending Back to Dongpu Hostel  15.00 Arrive at Dongbu hostel  16.00 Departure to Zhongli  21.00 Arrive at ZhongliNote that we can order food at Paiyun Lodge, 1 meal cost is[masked] NTD, other than that we can eat bread or something similar.Equipment:  1. hiking boot  2. Trekking Suite, Jacket and raincoat  3. Trekking Pole, Backpack  4. Food, Snacks, Water  5. Personal Medicine  6. Headlamp  7. Warm Gloves and Hat any question please email me at [masked]. thank you.

host: Language x Board game gathering in Tainan
title: 12/10 Let's play board game and learn languages(English or others)
location: 和興新 - 台南市永康區中正南路571號, Tainan
description: Hi everyone,The board game that we are sharing is City of Horror and/or Citadels. If you have a board game that you wish to share, you can bring it too. Anyway through out the game you have to try to communicate in English (or other languages that you wish to enhance). The gathering is absolutely free so help yourself to it! Description of Citadels by Boardgamegeek.com In Citadels, players take on new roles each round to represent characters they hire in order to help them acquire gold and erect buildings. The game ends at the close of a round in which a player erects his/her eighth building. Players then tally their points, and the player with the highest score wins.Players start with a number of building cards in their hand; buildings come in five colors, with the purple buildings typically having a special ability and the other colored buildings providing a benefit when you play particular characters. At the start of each round, the player who was king the previous round discards one of the eight character cards at random, chooses one, then passes the cards to the next player, etc. until each player has secretly chosen a character. Each character has a special ability, and the usefulness of any character depends upon your situation, and that of your opponents. The characters then carry out their actions in numerical order: the assassin eliminating another character for the round, the thief stealing all gold from another character, the wizard swapping building cards with another player, the warlord optionally destroys a building in play, and so on.On a turn, a player earns two or more gold (or draws two building cards then discards one), then optionally constructs one building (or up to three if playing the architect this round). Buildings cost gold equal to the number of symbols on them, and each building is worth a certain number of points. In addition to points from buildings, at the end of the game a player scores bonus points for having eight buildings or buildings of all five colors. Video explanation on citadels

title: Game Night!
location: 人性空間 - 台北市羅斯福路三段286巷4弄1號，捷運公館站4號出口, Taipei
description: INTRODUCTION: We start with the game Werewolf and split off into other games. BYO Board games/booze/food. Great Thai place right across the street along with a plethora of other varieties to choose from. Feel free to bring your own games. However, depending on how things go, we might or might not get to your games. So far we've played Cards Against Humanity, Mafia/Werewolf, Gloom, Egyptian Ratscrew, Spoons, Bang!, Chess, Forbidden Island,Citadels, Coup, The Resistance: Avalon, Camel Up, and 7 Wonders. ALL NEW PLAYERS ARE WELCOME, no problemo, we are great at teaching games.WHERE: Human Space, https://www.facebook.com/humanspace123, it's in a little alley by the park. You'll see a giant mural of pets at the end of the alley. You can bring your own food and drinks. You will be required to take off your shoes at this place. Address: 台北市羅斯福路三段286巷4弄1號, Taipei (near MRT Gongguan Exit 4, 捷運公館站4號出口, it's in a small street with a giant animal mural on one end and the street is right next to an also small park)WHEN: 7-11pm COST: 150 entrance feeWHO: All are welcome, we are a great mix of locals and expats and we welcome and encourage new people to come to learn new games so come make new friends. Bring wine/beer/food/games to share if you'd like :] Afterwards, if anyone is interested, we go to Roxyrocker (400nt, covers two drinks), NTU for beer drinking, or 小李子清粥小菜 for midnight congee. Find us on facebook and line. FB: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1413993592235686/HOSTS: We're a small group of hosts that the great Bruce entrusted to keep this group going. Tonight's host is Joyce. Late comers welcome but try your best to be on time. No need to message us if you will be late and if you don't have any games to bring, hakuna matata. See you all!COURTESY AND OTHER MISCELLANEOUS:Please RSVP only if you intend to show up. It's not fair if you RSVP and not show up, when someone else who intends to come is on the wait list. Also we ask for a donation of whatever amount you like. This group is non-profit but it requires a certain amount of fund to keep a MeetUp group running on here. So at the end of the night, if you enjoyed playing games with us and liked the moderating, feel free to donate so we can keep this group running. Thank you and see you all!

title: The original Yonghe Dou Jiang 原始永和豆漿 (世界豆漿)
location: 世界豆漿 - No. 284, Section 2, Yonghe Road, Yonghe District, New Taipei city
description: The very famous yonghe dou jiang has stores all over Taiwan, China, US, Canada, Japan, and numerous other countries.  We will go to the original store where it all started.  In its prime, there were 4 stores with the same name all right across from each other, today there is only this one that is left, which actually has the name World Dou jian.  (dou jiang in chinese means soy milk) but the sign clearly identifies it as the original yonghe dou jian store!  The traditional Taiwanese breakfast typically consist of a fresh bowl of soy milk (hot or cold) a fried crueller wrapped in a rectangle pastry with seasame seeds on top.  Other typical dishes are dan bing (egg on top of a tortilla like pancake) Lo Bo Gao (Turnip cake) and fan twan (stuffed sticky rice roll) <Sorry for the bad ping ying and loose translations> It is all very delicious and cheap and will make for a nice brunch!PricePlan on spending about $[masked] per person. (Depending on your appetite and variety you desire)  Each item will probably be around $20-$50Important Note on Attendance and SeatingI'm not a morning person and it is not centrally located so I am making the meeting time a little later, but please don't be late.  This is nothing fancy and will be a quick meal.  We will be imposing our rules so if things change update your RSVP 24 hours prior.  Since this is breakfast, same morning changes in RSVP without an explanation could result in a ban!Obviously there is no reservations since it is a typical Taiwanese place, we may end up splitting up the seating, but the earlier we can get everyone together the easier the process will be.  I will assist everyone in ordering if needed*****Important note on location*****There are several locations of Yonghe dou Jian and even World dou Jian, please make sure you are going to the one in Yonghe near the dingxi mrt stationpicture collage credit: http://www.ipeen.com.tw/comment/1031258

title: Taipei LGBTIQ+ weekly meetup
location: H*ours Café - No. 12, Alley 8, Lane 210, Section 3, Roosevelt Road, Zhongzheng District, Taipei City, 100 , Taipei
description: English below. 各位親愛的朋友大家好： 想找一個既安全又好玩的地方認識LBGTIQ及各個社群的朋友嗎？那就一定要參加我們的每週聚會！在這裏我們無所不談：LGBTIQ議題、早餐吃了甚麼…… 只要想到的東西也可以跟我們分享，同時可以認識從台灣本土到國外朋友！ 我們每個星期二 下午7時於H*ours Café碰面，詳情如下：地址：台北市羅斯福路三段210巷8弄12號1樓 (台電大樓站#1出口)地圖：https://www.google.com/maps?q=No.+12,+Alley+8,+Lane+210,+Section+3,+Roosevelt+Road,+Zhongzheng+District,+Taipei+City,+100+,+Taipei 請趕快報名，我們期望跟你碰碰面，也請多邀請你的朋友們一起出席，令我們這個LBGTIQ社群能日漸成長 . (Thank you to Nicky for the translation.)Hej folks! Looking for a safe and cool space to meet other LGBTIQ+ people? Then our weekly meet up is for you! Discuss LGBTIQ+ topics, or what you had for breakfast, make friends and get to know the Taipei crowd.We meet at the Café "H*ours Café" every Tuesday at 7 pm. Address: No. 12, Alley 8, Lane 210, Section 3, Roosevelt Road, Zhongzheng District, Taipei City, 100 , TaipeiLink: https://www.google.com/maps?q=No.+12,+Alley+8,+Lane+210,+Section+3,+Roosevelt+Road,+Zhongzheng+District,+Taipei+City,+100+,+TaipeiPlease RSVP as soon as possible :) Take your friends along and help growing healthy LGBTIQ+ spaces.Best,Honey Nut Queerios

title: Django 實戰 - 自己的購物網站自己做
location: clbc 四樓 - 大安區復興南路一段293號, Taipei
description: 大家好 ：） 有別於「 Python Web Meetup 」的輕鬆分享和「 Django 新手村」的手把手教學。  這次，我們想嘗試用工作坊的形式，一起來寫自己的購物網站。 「Django 實戰」系列工作坊：• 每兩週的星期二晚上• 以打造自己的購物網站為目標，每次以不同主題實作購物網站的一部分  • 適合有 Django 基礎的人，請務必先完成 Django Girls Taipei 學習指南 裡面的所有項目• 請準備好自己的筆電，並先安裝好 Python 3.5 第二堂：程式版本管理 by TP當你的程式逐漸成長，就會逐漸需要一個系統管理你目前的進度、讓你可以隨時備份、在發生意外時將程式回復成確定正常的狀態。我們會帶大家學習使用 Git 管理自己的程式，並將程式上傳至 GitHub 這個服務。我們會使用 Git-it 這個程式來進行教學，請務必先在當天之前先安裝好，確認程式可以執行，並在左上角選擇正體中文。Git-it 載點：   ·   Windows   ·   Mac   ·   Linux並請記得安裝 Git。如果你有確實完成 Django Girls Taipei 學習指南，應該就已經安裝了。小撇步：這個教學程式可以用來自學，所以你可以先自己偷偷跟著做，這樣當天就不需要跟著別人的進度，可以直接搶先開始問自己不懂的地方！賺到啦 ( و ･ㅂ･)و 課前準備：• 請先註冊好 Github 帳號：https://github.com/• 複習上一堂的內容：http://www.slideshare.net/flywindy/django-69634386  本次活動限額 40 位，每人酌收場地費 200 元。 請大家報名了一定要來參加，不要浪費名額喔！Thanks,Michelle

host: Global Adventurers Asia Taipei 台北 國際 朋友
title: Fun with Badminton and Friends XVII
Python Study Group for Beginners
location: Syntrend 11F - 台北市市民大道三段二號, Taipei
description: 課程簡介Python 是一門強調簡潔、易讀、也因此能夠快速學習的程式語言，並可以用於開發網站、桌面應用程式、自動化測試、產品原型、科學研究、嵌入式設備等領域。不僅適合初學者作為第一門程式語言，由淺入深地學習電腦科學；也適合作為資深開發者的第二語言，成為強而有力的輔助工具。這門課程將會融合基礎電腦科學、搭配大量程式範例和務實的開發練習，帶領學員打下扎實的基礎知識。並透過互動式的課程設計與學習工具，一層一層地的深入每個主題。同時也會介紹真實世界中常用的套件，為實戰做好準備。整門課程可以讓學員利用最少的時間掌握最完備的知識體系。課程時間這門課程內容豐富，會拆成 8 次上課，讓學員充分吸收。會於 12/7–1/25 的每週三 7:00–9:30 PM 上課，前 30 分鐘為交流時間。建議盡可能連續參加避免跟不上喔。課程大綱EnvironmentIntroduction — Python 是個什麼樣的程式語言：能做什麼、為什麼要學Setup — 設定 Python 開發環境，安裝必要套件“Hello Python!” — 撰寫一支最簡單的 Python 程式及了解運作方式General Programming TopicsData Type and Control Flow I — 介紹程式設計基本工具箱：資料型別與流程控制基礎與實做Data Type and Control Flow II — 在基礎上介紹更多 Python 資料型別與流程控制及基礎例外處理與實做Function — 使用函數模組化：函數的基礎概念、在 Python 的用法與實做Built-In Functions — 介紹常用內建函數IO and File — 與外部互動：基礎輸入輸出與檔案Methods of String — 介紹常用字串方法The Challenges: Find the Largest File & Find the Largest Directory — 實做練習：找最大的檔案與資料夾Fascinating Programming Topics in PythonGenerator and Comprehensions — 介紹快速建構容器內容與簡化程式的 Python 語法：產生器與理解式Functional Tools — 介紹 Python 中函數式程式設計的工具Module and Package — 進一步模組化：建立模組與套件與安裝第三方套件Useful Packages — 站在巨人的肩膀上：常用內建、第三方套件介紹，如 os, collections, json, requests, … 等等Object-oriented Programming — Python 的物件導向程式設計A Mini Project: Web Crawler — 實做迷你專案：網頁爬蟲 Coach Mosky: Mosky is Python Charmer at Pinkoi, works with colleagues to build the best online marketplace for unique gifts, and has love for Python and open source. She is teaching Python, working on Python projects, like Clime and MoSQL, and has shared at PyCons, COSCUPs, TEDxNTUST in Taiwan, and PyCons in Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Korea. More: mosky.tw *全程免費，謝謝Mosky教練願意帶領Python讀書會並自編課程，也謝謝台灣新創競技場（ＴＳＳ）的飲食贊助，三創育成基金會（Star Rocket)的場地贊助，請大家7:00入場吃點東西聊聊天認識大家，正式課程7:30開始。

title: Delicious Western Food
location: The Diner - 信義區松壽路12號 ATT4Fun 1st floor, Taipei
description: The Diner We were craving a western-style brunch, and The Diner exceeded our expectations. The restaurant is located between Starbucks and ATT for Fun Building. It has a friendly environment and the menu is in English. We ordered the avocado and shrimp Eggs Benedict and the Croque Madame. Food was delicious. We were pleasantly surprised by how good the hash brown was. Normally, we're not huge fans, but it was perfectly done. Having lived in Taiwan for years, we're used to having Taiwanese/Asian-spins on classic dishes (not that we're entirely against it!), but it was just nice to have the dishes done the way we grew up eating them :) We also ordered the Nutella Marshmallow Smoothie and it was love at first sip.The service was also very efficient. Combined with the almost-full restaurant, we expected the Eggs Benedict to take a long time, just from prior experience at different restaurants, but from the time we ordered the food until we finished, only 30 minutes had actually passed, and we never rushed ourselves.

title: Beginner Charleston Dance Lesson
description: City Hoppers has a new and exciting course for December, taught by an excellent dancer! 1200 NT for 3 classes, or 100 NT for just social. Send an email to register for class to [masked]Can also register with this form-  https://goo.gl/n4rvlI Please bring shoes for inside the studio! [Charleston入門班]  聽著活潑的節拍，踏著輕快的步伐，一踢一踏，在悠揚的爵士樂中旋轉擺動，這絕對是在今年最復古的時尚！ Charleston是Swing Dance的舞風之一，起源於1920年代，在許多復古電影或是早期百老匯的演出當中，都可以發現他的蹤影。華麗優雅、可愛俏皮，無論是獨舞或雙人，Charleston總能讓人感受到歡樂無比的氣氛與滿滿的活力！現在，就讓我們一起體驗Charleston的魔力吧！ 透過三周的課程，帶你從Charleston認識Swing的歷史與發展，並學習不同年代Charleston的舞步與變化，過程中除了體驗Swing的好玩，更深入淺出的帶入雙人舞的技巧與概念，絕對是你Swing入門的最佳選擇！ 課程內容  Week1：Basic Charleston step  帶你認識Swing dance及1920年代、1930年代的基本Charleston舞步  Week2：Charleston partner variation  在Charleston基本舞步裡加上一些雙人變化的動作與學習雙人Swing的基本概念  Week3：Charleston cool moves  加上一些kick和turn的動作讓你的Charleston看起來更cool!(實際上課內容依學生狀況做調整) 程度需求  無需任何Swing dance或其他舞蹈基礎。Please send me private message if you need more information in English.Update- All classes have moved to Wednesday nights at Soo Dance Studio. There will be no more events at Old Young.

title: 美秀從波士頓來，分享新藥研發的幾個故事
location: 清大圖書館一樓清沙龍 - 新竹市光復路二段101號, hsinchu city
description: A couple of stories in drug development (藥物研發的故事)Dr. Mei-Hsiu Ling (中文演講)Drug development is a lengthy and expensive process.  It usually starts with a sound scientific theory.  There are extensive experiments in the lab, on animals before a compound can be tested on humans.  To bring an effective treatment to patients, it needs to succeed in all the phases of experiments in humans. There are successes and failures.  In this session, I will review a couple of recent stories.Bio of Dr. Mei-Hsiu LingMei-Hsiu Ling joined Vertex in 2012 as the Biostatistics head for Hepatitis C franchise and currently leads the Cystic Fibrosis franchise and is the department head for the statistical programming group. Prior to joining Vertex, Dr. Ling was Global Program Head of Respiratory franchise at Novartis.  She has more than 20 years of experience in late phase drug development.  She has a Ph.D. in Statistics from U.C. Berkeley and a B.S. in Mathematics from National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan.She is a board of director (and the president, 2016) for Monte Jade New England (mj-ne.org) and will serve as an executive committee member for Global Monte Jade in 2017.主辦：波士頓--台灣知識交流平台(Boston-Taiwan Platform)、清大圖書館

title: Young Toastmasters Club 2nd Monthly Meeting
location: 中科里仁社區活動中心(近國安國宅、瑞聯天地) - 西屯區國安一路210巷21號2F, 台中市
description: About Young Toastmasters Club  Most people think of Toastmasters as a way to improve speaking in front of groups. While that is an important benefit, most Toastmasters do not aspire to be a platform speaker. Young Toastmasters is much more than that. Giving speeches does help you become prepared and organized. However each Toastmaster meeting provide a variety of speaking opportunities that help professionals express themselves more powerfully and concisely whether in a formal presentation, impromptu setting, and as the Toastmasters (host) of the meeting -- thus helping develop effective interpersonal communicating skills that can be applied in professional settings, such as communicating with customers, managers, and co-workers. Being a good impromptu speaker makes you appear smarter, more poised and able to handle difficult situations. This allows us to become more successful as we gain confidence in our ability to communicate effectively in a wide variety of situations. In short, Toastmasters gives us a competitive advantage in our professional careers.

title: Love and local food in the heart of old soul Taipei
location: MRT Daqiaotou Station(orange line), Exit 1  - Dadaocheng, Taipei
description: There's all kinds of old streets all over Taiwan, but Dadaocheng is a particularly special flavor of old street. Straight from the mouth of Wikipedia: Dadaocheng is an area in the Datong District, part of the Taipei Basin and a historic section of Taipei. … Dadaocheng was an important trading port in the 19th century, and is still a major historical tourist attraction and shopping area. The district is known for the local Taiwanese cuisine, the Chien-Cheng Circle, and also being the center of the February 28 Incident. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dadaocheng)Tiff, a local Taiwanese guide for Taipei, will take us all around Dadaocheng for some of the best eats and some cultural exploration too!• Start off with a hot, fresh bowl of traditional meat porridge.• Learn how to pray for love the old school way at Xia-Hai City God Temple. • Explore century-old shops that have disappeared and reappeared over the years. 百年老街商店的傳承與再生• Snack on and learn about organic, locally sourced fruits in Taiwan.• Hear unique stories about local life in the area. 當地的人文故事導覽• From oyster pancakes to red bean cakes, we'll eat our way through Ningxia Night Market, taking in some of the best stuff.(Please read through the event details, cost, and attendance policy below. Thanks!)And now, a word from Tiff!【Dihua St.】 is the busiest block in Dadaocheng. It has been the core of the Dadaocheng business area since the end of the Qing Dynasty. In 2010, Taiwan's government called for the preservation of the block and advocated cultural innovation, which not only retained the old look of the streets, but also introduced youngsters artistic and cultural innovations there.【迪化街】是大稻埕最熱鬧的街區，從清末到現在，一直都是大稻埕商圈的核心，尤其2010年經台灣政府刻意保存及提倡文創注入, 不僅大體上保持完整舊時街道的風貌, 還添加了台灣年輕人的文藝新創。This is also a renowned CNY merchandise street in Taiwan. Grocery stores, traditional Chinese medicine stores and characteristic cultural and artistic stores open for business at ordinary times. However, it's a pity to only pay a brief visit.這裡也是台灣有名的年貨大街, 平時則有些雜貨、中藥行、特色人文商店等等, 但是來到這, 若僅僅只是走馬看花就實在太可惜了! Every time when I walk in characteristic stores, the inheritance and reappearance of century-old stores, manual experience courses, brew-ups in historical sites and the publics faith towards old temples with local residents, I am so surprised!大稻埕是近期Tiff自己也非常喜愛的景點, 每次去跟當地人深聊不管是特色商店、百年老店的傳承與再現、手工體驗課程、古蹟內的精品手沖咖啡、民間信仰古廟的文化.....各方面都令Tiff震驚到下巴快要掉下來了!!!A lot of renowned historical sites and characteristic stores are hidden in alleys. The details about some performances, experiences and special opening time have to be confirmed with me!還有很多傳承百年以上的古蹟商店, 都默默藏在巷弄裡面, 有些表演跟體驗, 還有特殊的開放時間, 詳情還是請旅行者再跟踢夫確認吧! :))【Ningxia Night Market】: Ningxia Night Market is famous for delicious street food. However, I will only take you to the booths which only local residents know to go. Its silly to follow the visitors. You should not miss that if you want to experience the night market culture of Taiwan!【寧夏夜市】: 寧夏夜市專出美食小吃, 但踢夫只會帶你去當地人才會去吃的攤販, 別當冤大頭, 跟著觀光客亂排就太傻囉! 想體驗台灣夜市文化的, 可別錯過了!【Dadaocheng Wharf】We'll take in the sunset and stroll along Tamsui River. Tourists can enjoy the breeze while biking near the river after supper, a simple life style of the residents in Taipei.【大稻埕碼頭】, 可以是看夕陽跟淡水河夜景的散步小景點, 吃完晚餐後在河濱騎單車享受晚風, 也是台北人的簡單生活之一喔!Note: Please wear comfort clothes for walking or biking. COST1100 NT/personABOUT TIFFHello, I'm Tiff, an energetic girl who can take leave without delay or play, sing with you by guitar/ukulele or even more to accompany you to sit down, taste fine coffee and talk about the development of Taipeis history. Being a Taipei walking guide, I like to sharing with people and making new friends. To me, the most treasured memory is the good interactions with local residents during the travels.Hello, 我是Tiff或是叫我踢夫, 在台北生活超過20年, 目前是台北城市導覽(walking tour)的志工導覽員之一, 可以是說走就走, 活力四射的火花女孩, 也可以帶你彈唱小吉他-烏克麗麗, 歡樂串場, 累了可以陪你坐下來細細品嘗, 聊聊台北古今發展的歷史演變。喜歡深度旅遊, 熱愛分享。特別喜愛蒐集 & 分享台灣的在地人文故事。 ATTENDANCE POLICYPlease see our group description to review our standard attendance policy. Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you on the 17th!

title: [殭屍路跑]
location: 新北市河濱公園 - New Taipei City Riverbank, New Taipei City
description: 2013全台灣第一場原創殭屍路跑，2016年再度 屍變揪你一起屍速狂奔！ 活動時間：2016年12月17日(六) 14:00~17:00 活動地點：新北市河濱公園 (近期公布) 路跑路程 ：3.5km 年齡限制 ：18歲以上 一律採網路報名，線上報名請至：報名網頁 – 活動咖網站 www.zombierun.com.tw[ Zombie Run ] Date: Sat 17th December 2016. 2pm to 5pm. Venue: New Taipei City near an MRT, details to be announced soon. Distance: 3.5km – you can run, walk or hide!活動費用 人類組原價$980，早鳥優惠價$780 殭屍特效化妝組(含現場化妝，不含服裝) $1,350 殭屍DIY組(到場前已自行裝扮成殭屍) $ 690 (*以上報名費用包含活動及物資費，不含平台手續費及郵寄費用) 報名流程 1. 請先選好時段(共七梯次) 2. 再選擇人類組或殭屍DIY或殭屍特效化妝組A. 14:00 E. 16:00 B. 14:30 F. 16:30 C. 15:00 G. 17:00 D. 15:30 角色組別 殭屍組 (有A、B兩種)：適合族群—平常壓力大、工作緊張繁忙、內心負面情緒高漲的你！這是一個透過角色扮演、流汗、追逐、鬼叫，達到紓壓宣洩的健康管道。當然，喜好殭屍片的戲精和愛嚇人的你，也是報名殭屍組最佳人選！殭屍的任務很簡單，要奪取跑者腰上的紅色命帶子，但請注意不要有推擠等攻擊跑者情況發生，若遭現場工作人員規勸檢舉無效，將喪失參賽資格必須馬上離場。 A. 殭屍特效化妝組 (含現場特效化妝，不含服裝)請攜帶之前寄送給你的殭屍包裡的特效化妝券和辨識手環，請穿著一件你不要的T恤，撕破沾滿顏料弄髒都不會痛心的衣服，於你報名梯次提早1個半小時前抵達活動現場，到特效化妝處報到化殭屍妝，完妝後於指定時間地點集合聽取殭屍軍頭的簡報，之後就可以按梯次起跑開始狩獵人類。 B. 殭屍DIY組 (到場前已自行裝扮為殭屍)把你最囂張厲害的家私拿出來，裝扮成嚇死人不償命的殭屍，殭屍DIY組請於你報名的梯次提早半小時前來到活動報到(建議不要化太過複雜的特效妝，否則一流汗又追逐，假皮會掉得滿地都是喔！) ，之後於指定時間地點集合聽取殭屍軍頭的簡報。 人類組：適合族群—跑贏所有殭屍的終極成就感, 成為最屌的生存者！適合平常喜歡看鬼片、逛鬼屋的你，盡情享受閃躲、奔跑、尖叫的快感，和其他人類組團想策略逃過殭屍追殺。也歡迎平常有在跑步的你，有別於直線式路跑，閃躲殭屍追擊會是體能上的新挑戰喔！殭屍:名人指定 特效彩妝師來協助殭屍路跑拍攝 Make-up for Zombies Runners Taipei, Taiwan shoot by celebrity make-up artist that has worked on the Walking Dead promotionsDon’t miss the 殭屍路跑 Zombie Run Taiwan殭屍路跑FB粉絲頁: www.facebook.com/ZombieRunTaiwanIf you booked online, and have not received any emails, pleases contact us at [masked] To participate in the race, please email us.

title: 利用Python從遊戲中產生人工智慧
location: 夢種子 - 台中市西屯區河南路二段262號14樓, Taichung
description: 大綱：近年 AI 技術有許多進展，其中一個主要目標是讓 AI 可以解決複雜問題，而我們人類不需要教它 如何處理，AI 自己會去尋找好的解決方法。 這樣的 AI 必須有能力從環境中獲取資訊，並且有能力利用資訊做出好的決策，在不斷改變的環境中探索新的訊息，不斷修正自己的錯誤。為了讓 AI 產生這樣的能力，我們需要讓 AI 處在一個不斷變動的環境下，並給予獎懲機制，讓它不斷獲取新資訊產生決策，不斷修正錯誤，讓自己能生存下去或獲得最大效益。電腦遊戲就是一個非常適合的環境，例如槍戰遊戲必須不斷探索地圖與搜索敵人，遭遇之後雙方發生戰鬥，擊敗敵人或獲取道具即得到獎勵，戰鬥失敗則得到懲罰， AI 必須修正自己的策略戰術，下一輪設法擊敗敵人。目前 OpenAI 已經整合許多遊戲項目到 OpenAI Gym 讓 AI 研究者測試自己的演算法，本次分享將會介紹我嘗試過的項目，例如：•  透過 Deep Q-Network 玩小精靈與槍戰遊戲 VizDoom  • 透過 Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient 玩賽車遊戲 Torcs• 透過 Asynchronous Advantage Actor-Critic (A3C) 讓多個 AI 能各自探索環境，並共享學習到的錯誤經驗，讓整體 AI 能更快速提升決策能力 講者簡介：JiaweiTaiwan R User Group / MLDM Monday 與 Kaohsiung Python社群的 Co-organizer, 同時也是電子商務公司的研發工程師，熱衷於研究機器學習相關技術，並應用在實務工作上。

title: Taiwan Virtual Reality Meetup for December 2016
location: Cardinal Blue Office - 台北市大安區光復南路102號7樓 (7F, No. 102, Guangfu S. Road, Taipei), Taipei
description: We are on a roll so it's time for another session of the TAIWAN VIRTUAL REALITY MEETUP! The Taiwan Virtual Reality December Meetup is scheduled for Saturday, Dec. 17, 2016.Have you joined our Facebook group?  Join us at https://www.facebook.com/groups/taiwan3d for regular updates on things 3D or 360° or VR or AR. As always, we're setting our meetups as lower key small scale getting-together gatherings as part of our community building efforts.In addition to meetup discussion and socializing, we may also have low key discussion or presentational topics ready but we will absolutely leave plenty of time for open discussion among attendees along with free-talk time for connecting, networking, and experiential VRing.No, you do NOT need to have any previous experience with Virtual Reality to attend.These meetups are conducted in ENGLISH.We will meet on Saturday, December 17, and begin at 2:30pm and end by 5:30pm or so or earlier.Free form social discussion and demos begin after any talks and group discussions end.  You are strongly encouraged to bring along your favorite VR viewers to demo, share, or discuss (not required but it's a nice thing to have with you).  There will be presentations but also demonstrations and time for free participation as in socialization, meet and greet, and sharing of participants favorite experiences.CONFIRMED TOPICSTOPIC: Locomotion in Virtual Reality: lessons learned from BattleSky VR   Speaker Name: David Huang   Company Name: Oh!WHATif Inc.  Webpage: http://www.BattleSkyVR.com Brief Description:  Moving around in VR has long been a challenge, as players often get motion sickness from poorly designed locomotion mechanics.  As a result, many VR experiences only allow players to move around by unnatural teleportation or limit players to a confined space.  BattleSkyVR introduces a brand new VR locomotion experience which breaks free from the Room-scale.  The game started with the question, "What if I can Fly?", allowing different characters to fly around the virtual world freely while engaging in aerial combats.  We explored with flying like a Dragon by flapping your wings, blasting through the air with rockets like Ironman, and leaping across the canyons like the King Kong.  We will also be doing a demo of our game with two Vive stations, allowing for live multiplayer games.  For more information, see our website:  http://www.BattleSkyVR.com TOPIC: Design Hurdles and the MySight360 VR Action Camera  Speaker Name: Jimmy Shi-mu Sun Company Name: MySight360  Webpage: https://www.facebook.com/MySight360Brief Description: (1) What are special issues one faces when designing an action camera for VR. (2) The crowdfunding experience sharing, especially on how to introduction the new technology to crowds (3) What we want to do for the next step? To build up the Trip/Hiking Virtual Reality Experience Platform See our Kickstarter page at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/660471689/mysight360-worlds-first-wearable-vr-camera-for-hik for videos and more info.If and when we have other confirmed presentation topics, they will go here. We are actively seeking presenters, demo providers, or discussion leaders.  If you would like to participate, let us know.  If you know someone who might like to join us as a presenter or demonstration provider, please do encourage them to contact the organizer. If you're a developer or content creator (3D or 360° or VR or AR with Google Cardboard, Daydream, Gear VR, OSVR, Vive, Oculus Rift, or other systems) and would like to present, please feel free to drop the host a line about being added to the program. You do NOT need to be a content creator to share so if you know of an app or even content that you particularly think others will enjoy, feel free to share as well.As folks contact the meetup organizers to be included as presenters, we will place their information in this section.  Please contact Brian David Phillips at [masked] or via the Meetup messaging system if you'd like to present.In addition to any member presentations, we will include:"Google Cardboard Demonstration" and discussion.  "Samsung Gear VR Demonstration" and discussion.  "HTC Vive Demonstration" and discussion.  "PSVR Demonstration" and discussion.  Addition program possibilities may include:"Open VR Discussion" round-table, panel, or group discussion of issues related to virtual reality content development, viewers, software, content, or whatever.  If there are specific topics you would like included in discussion, let us know and we will post them here.  Feel free to participate and discuss anything else related to 3D or 360° or VR or AR you would like to explore. "VR Demonstration Time" is when folks are free to share demonstrations of virtual reality or related programs. Feel free to bring viewers and software related to 3D or 360° or VR or AR you would like to demonstrate (formal presenters will have time to present their demo materials to the group prior to breaking into the chaotic free-for-all that is demo time, so if you want specific feedback, it's a good idea to be sign up as a presenter).  You do NOT need to be a presenter to bring something to demo (you may demo your own work-in progress for feedback or finish products or simply something by someone else you think is pretty cool). "Open VR Social" meet and greet in which you can meet others, network, or just generally discuss or share your favorite viewers, software, content, or whatever. Feel free to bring your favorite or most hated VR viewers to brag about or lament or discuss your favorite or not so favorite apps and programs or pretty much anything else related to 3D or 360° or VR or AR you would like to discuss or share."More Topics May Be Added" - contact the host (Brian David Phillips) if you would like to be added with a topic of your own.If you're a developer or content creator (3D or 360° or VR or AR with Google Cardboard, Vive, Oculus Rift, or other systems) and would like to present, please feel free to drop the host a line about being added to the program. You do NOT need to be a content creator to share so if you know of an app or even content that you particularly think others will enjoy, feel free to share as well. Include the following information with your query (use this format):"TOPIC or TITLE" to be presented by YOUR FULL NAME and the NAME of YOUR COMPANY OR DEVELOPMENT GROUP (URL of Appropriate Webpage). Provide a few sentences or paragraph giving us an idea of what you wish to be presenting or demonstrating.  See previous meetups for examples.Specific schedule and length of presentation details to be determined later (depending upon number of presentations and time needs and constraints.As this is part of our series of meetups for the group, we are going low key. We are meeting in a public space in Taipei (most likely in Ximending) so space is limited. Therefore we are limiting participation to the first folks who sign up in this meetup event page – it is also appreciated, but not required, if you send a private message to the host Brian David Phillips confirming intention to attend (otherwise you may be removed if we have a waiting list).  We absolutely must have a minimum of at least fifteen attendees for the meetup (if we don't make the minimum, we can't promise future events). Future formal meetups may be open to more folks and possibly in other locations as we grow.Please note, we do take attendance.  If you register to attend and do not show up, we have a record.  We reserve the right to remove or even ban members who take attendance slots and do not use them.  When you take a slot, it can mean someone else can’t go.  If you can’t come, then take yourself off the list in a timely manner.  It’s the polite thing to do.SPECIAL NOTICE ~ We are meeting in a new space in Taipei near in and around the area of the CTS Building on Guangfu S. Road:  106台北市大安區光復南路102號7樓  (Google Maps Link). 國父紀念館站1號出站，看到Starbucks右轉，經過7-11馬上左轉，從Chin Chin咖啡廳旁大樓搭電梯至7樓7F, No. 102, Guangfu S. Road, Taipei, Taiwan (Google Maps Link). Exit from SYS Memorial MRT Station, Exit 1. When you see Starbucks, make a right turn into the alley, and then after you pass 7-11, make your first left. When you reach the CTS building with the Chin Chin cafe, take the elevator to the 7th floor, and look for the office with the red wall and "PicCollage" sign.See http://cardinalblue.com/address for more info!The meeting will be held in a private company space so folks are asked to help set up at the beginning of the meeting and to help put things away and clean up after ourselves.  The folks who are donating the space our being very gracious and so please tell them THANK YOU and help out.  If you are not okay with this, then please do not check attending on the Meetup group's event page.Please be on time. There is limited space in the room so if you are not registered, you may not be able to stay (depending upon space). Since this is a largish group, there is a waiting list for folks who miss out on the initial quota of registration spots. If someone signs up but they don't confirm attendance they may be bumped and the next person on the waiting list comes through.If the event is full and you wish to attend, then register and you will be placed on the waiting list.  If someone drops out or is removed, folks on the waiting list get moved into the attendee list (Meetup will notify you of the change in status).If you would like to be a "presenter" then send some details to Brian David Phillips and we will discuss adding you to the informal program.***************************************************************Please be on time as we are booking a narrow window.If you have not confirmed you will be attending, please do so (send a message to the host in addition to clicking attending here).BTW, if you haven't joined our FB group, head over to the group at  https://www.facebook.com/groups/taiwan3d and join us now. Schedule Details Subject to Revision. Please be aware that specific details on this event may be changed. So, check back every once in awhile to see what has been added or other new details.If the event fills up and you are unable to register, don't give up completely.  As we get closer to the event day, some folks may drop out so you might have a chance to snarf up their spots as they become available.***************************************************************

title: 跟著服務科學逛市場
location: 開門工作室 - 新竹市東區大同路86號3樓3114 (東門市場3F), Hsinchu
description: • 「服務科學是什麼？」是個讓人感興趣的問題。台灣服務科學學會在服務科學的推廣過程中，「在地實踐」可謂服務科學理論應用的具體展現。2013年起新竹縣橫山鄉台三線的沿線中，服科學會在地實踐計畫更是催生了廢校30年的「豐鄉國小」以「大山北月」的全新面貌重新活化。 • 「開門工作室」駐點於閒置的新竹東門市場，在2015後半年開始至今的過程間，已透過牆面彩繪妝點市場公共空間，並舉辦多場講座與工作坊活動，在清華大學、新竹市政府及地方產業網絡的協助下，推動東門市場以「青年基地」的形式活化。 • 當「服務科學」遇上「東門市場」究竟會有什麼樣的新想法發生？開門工作室在此誠摯的邀請您走入這座老市場，在服務科學的觀點之中和我們一同聊聊東門市場未來公共生活的新想像。 ＜活動流程＞ 14:00 - 14:30：入場 14:30 - 14:50：市場探索 14:50 - 15:20：脈絡介紹 15:20 - 16:10：小桌對談 16:10 - 16:30：茶敘 ＜相關資訊＞ 開門工作室：https://www.facebook.com/khuimngstudio/ 台灣服務科學學會：https://goo.gl/dJd1SE

title: 從0到1的網頁爬蟲 台中 - 03
location: Dreamseeds 夢種子 - 台中市西屯區河南路二段262號14樓, Taichung

title: Christmas Swing Social Party 聖誕搖擺爵士派對
location: InBetween International - 3F.-1, No.176, Siwei 4th Rd., Lingya Dist., Kaohsiung
description: 【For English, please see below】在台灣，聖誕節大家都會做些什麼? 到餐廳吃大餐? 辦趴玩交換禮物? 今年聖誕來點不一樣的吧! 12/18號週日夜晚，高雄首場聖誕爵士搖擺趴邀請你前來體驗Swing社交舞的魅力，用風靡全球的爵士搖擺舞，輕鬆認識新朋友!【活動時間】☀ 6:30-7:00 國際聖誕文化交流InBetween International裡有來自各國的友人，歡迎一起來談天說地，用文化交流揭開序幕，分享世界各地不同的聖誕節文化及自己的聖誕節初體驗。☀ 7:00-8:00 社交舞可以很輕鬆 來自國際的友人們和Swing InBetween 搖擺爵士的老師們將帶跳Swing的基本舞步，一定要來體驗一下加拿大、美式甚至法式的爵士搖擺有什麼微妙的差異，舞蹈就是世界共同的語言！☀ 8:00-9:30 體驗一起搖擺的美好別擔心自己沒有舞蹈基礎，沒有伴也別傷心，不會跳舞也沒關係，只要記得帶一顆愉快的心情，來跟我們一起享受音樂，認識新朋友，感受一下異國文化的聖誕氛圍吧！【活動地點】聯創文化 InBetween International ：https://goo.gl/z7B3Y8【活動報名】當日現場報名NTD 250元 （前10名入場加贈『米九十露"香檳"汽泡醋飲』一支～）12/10 MLD 舞與樂的對話: 當爵士遇上搖擺～【樂來越愛你】現場報名 只要NTD 200元 (加碼贈『米九十露"香檳"汽泡醋飲』一支)＊＊＊想要先學跳舞再來Party的朋友，歡迎先來12/17 週末夜的Swing微體驗~ Swing InBetween~學會Jazz Swing經典的三疊步triple steps和優美的轉圈，輕鬆跳完一首歌！＊＊＊＊＊＊Party當晚體驗Swing舞步不另收費，但請大家另帶一雙乾淨的平底鞋，或攜帶不會磨損地板的舞鞋來更換，因為會有不少人是初學者，千萬別穿高跟鞋免得踩傷舞伴哦!＊＊＊當天會提供塞牙縫零食小點免費吃，還有喝不醉健康醋飲加價購，若要攜帶外食及飲料入場我們會酌收清潔費50元哦!＊＊＊【I’m Dreaming of a...】This Christmas you could…-Stay home and pine for Christmases past-Wander around the department store wondering what Taiwan Santa looks like-Skype with family back home that you were secretly glad to be away from-Go to the same boring bar Christmas activity with food likely from last yearOR…You could come party and dance the night away with old and new friends.On December 18th from 6:30 to 9:30 come to the InBetween Swing Christmas Social! ☀ 6:30 - 7:00 Cultural Exchange Brush up on your language skills so you can find a new dance partner. Have fun with our culture exchange time where you can talk to many different people and find someone you click with…☀ 7:00 - 8:00 Swing Dance TasterBring your dancing shoes. Our friends from Canada, France and U.S.A will all get together here in Kaohsiung to get you moving. If you aren’t ready to dance then just bring a smile. Feel free to to relax and enjoy the atmosphere.☀ 8:00 - 9:30 Swing Social TimeActivities end at 9:30 so if you want to go to that same boring bar Christmas gather you still could I guess...and take that hot guy/girl you met here with you, perhaps. ;) 【Where does Santa live?】Location: InBetween InternationalNo. 176 3F-1 SiWei 4th RoadLingYa District, Kaohsiung City 802Entry: 250NT (Pay Onsite)【Eat, drink, and be merry】Swing taster comes at no extra charge but please bring another pair of shoes that won’t ruin the wood floor, and we'll provide some free light snacks and sparkling vinegar drinks for a discounted price, so please leave your food or drinks outside, or we'll charge a 50NT cleaning fee. Thanks a lot!

title: Beginner Charleston Dance Class
location: Sooo Dance - 2F., No.621, Sec. 1, Xiangshang Rd., Nantun Dist., Taichung City
description: City Hoppers has a new and exciting course for December, taught by an excellent dancer! 1200 NT for 3 classes, or 100 NT for just social. Send an email to register for class to [masked]Can also register with this form-  https://goo.gl/n4rvlI Please bring shoes for inside the studio! [Charleston入門班]  聽著活潑的節拍，踏著輕快的步伐，一踢一踏，在悠揚的爵士樂中旋轉擺動，這絕對是在今年最復古的時尚！ Charleston是Swing Dance的舞風之一，起源於1920年代，在許多復古電影或是早期百老匯的演出當中，都可以發現他的蹤影。華麗優雅、可愛俏皮，無論是獨舞或雙人，Charleston總能讓人感受到歡樂無比的氣氛與滿滿的活力！現在，就讓我們一起體驗Charleston的魔力吧！ 透過三周的課程，帶你從Charleston認識Swing的歷史與發展，並學習不同年代Charleston的舞步與變化，過程中除了體驗Swing的好玩，更深入淺出的帶入雙人舞的技巧與概念，絕對是你Swing入門的最佳選擇！ 課程內容  Week1：Basic Charleston step  帶你認識Swing dance及1920年代、1930年代的基本Charleston舞步  Week2：Charleston partner variation  在Charleston基本舞步裡加上一些雙人變化的動作與學習雙人Swing的基本概念  Week3：Charleston cool moves  加上一些kick和turn的動作讓你的Charleston看起來更cool!(實際上課內容依學生狀況做調整) 程度需求  無需任何Swing dance或其他舞蹈基礎。Please send me private message if you need more information in English. Update- All classes have moved to Wednesday nights at Soo Dance Studio. There will be no more events at Old Young.

title: Python Study Group for Beginners
location: Syntrend 11F - 台北市市民大道三段二號, Taipei
description: 課程簡介Python 是一門強調簡潔、易讀、也因此能夠快速學習的程式語言，並可以用於開發網站、桌面應用程式、自動化測試、產品原型、科學研究、嵌入式設備等領域。不僅適合初學者作為第一門程式語言，由淺入深地學習電腦科學；也適合作為資深開發者的第二語言，成為強而有力的輔助工具。這門課程將會融合基礎電腦科學、搭配大量程式範例和務實的開發練習，帶領學員打下扎實的基礎知識。並透過互動式的課程設計與學習工具，一層一層地的深入每個主題。同時也會介紹真實世界中常用的套件，為實戰做好準備。整門課程可以讓學員利用最少的時間掌握最完備的知識體系。課程時間這門課程內容豐富，會拆成 8 次上課，讓學員充分吸收。會於 12/7–1/25 的每週三 7:00–9:30 PM 上課，前 30 分鐘為交流時間。建議盡可能連續參加避免跟不上喔。課程大綱EnvironmentIntroduction — Python 是個什麼樣的程式語言：能做什麼、為什麼要學Setup — 設定 Python 開發環境，安裝必要套件“Hello Python!” — 撰寫一支最簡單的 Python 程式及了解運作方式General Programming TopicsData Type and Control Flow I — 介紹程式設計基本工具箱：資料型別與流程控制基礎與實做Data Type and Control Flow II — 在基礎上介紹更多 Python 資料型別與流程控制及基礎例外處理與實做Function — 使用函數模組化：函數的基礎概念、在 Python 的用法與實做Built-In Functions — 介紹常用內建函數IO and File — 與外部互動：基礎輸入輸出與檔案Methods of String — 介紹常用字串方法The Challenges: Find the Largest File & Find the Largest Directory — 實做練習：找最大的檔案與資料夾Fascinating Programming Topics in PythonGenerator and Comprehensions — 介紹快速建構容器內容與簡化程式的 Python 語法：產生器與理解式Functional Tools — 介紹 Python 中函數式程式設計的工具Module and Package — 進一步模組化：建立模組與套件與安裝第三方套件Useful Packages — 站在巨人的肩膀上：常用內建、第三方套件介紹，如 os, collections, json, requests, … 等等Object-oriented Programming — Python 的物件導向程式設計A Mini Project: Web Crawler — 實做迷你專案：網頁爬蟲 Coach Mosky: Mosky is Python Charmer at Pinkoi, works with colleagues to build the best online marketplace for unique gifts, and has love for Python and open source. She is teaching Python, working on Python projects, like Clime and MoSQL, and has shared at PyCons, COSCUPs, TEDxNTUST in Taiwan, and PyCons in Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Korea. More: mosky.tw *全程免費，謝謝Mosky教練願意帶領Python讀書會並自編課程，也謝謝台灣新創競技場（ＴＳＳ）的飲食贊助，三創育成基金會（Star Rocket)的場地贊助，請大家7:00入場吃點東西聊聊天認識大家，正式課程7:30開始。

title: MINDFULNESS AND CONCENTRATION Weekend Course Part 1
location: Manjughosha Buddhist Center - No. 2-1, Lane 77, Sec. 1 Hangzhou South Road,  Taipei ( MRT Shandao Temple station exit 5), Taipei
description: MINDFULNESS AND CONCENTRATION English Weekend Course  with Guest Teacher Buddhist monk Gen-la Kelsang JampaSat, 24 Dec, 2:30-5:30pm Part 1 – Mindfulness for Modern People  Sun, 25 Dec, 2:30-5:30pm Part 2 – Concentration: Building Strength Within Your MindIn this weekend workshop, we will learn in simple and practical ways how to be mindful and to develop the power of our concentration that we can carry in all aspects of our life. The ability to overcome distractions enables us to complete daily activities without stress and is the foundation for training in the path of meditation which leads to profound happiness and peace of mind.THE TEACHER  Gen-la Kelsang Jampa is the Deputy Spiritual Director of the New Kadampa Tradition – International Kadampa Buddhist Union and Resident Teacher of Kadampa Meditation Center Texas. Gen-la Jampa has been a student of Venerable Geshe Kelsang Gyatso Rinpoche for many years. Under Geshe-la’s guidance, he has taught at many centers and events internationally. Gen-la is well-loved for his clear and inspiring teachings, and his ability to touch people’s hearts through his sincerity and loving-kindness.Enjoy these video clips of Gen-la Jampa: 1. Summer Festival 2016 – Developing the Wish to Practice Meditation 2. Summer Festival 2013 – Generating the Supreme Good HeartTimetable (Sat-Sun):  2:00pm – 3:15pm Teaching and Meditation  3:15pm – 3:45pm Tea Break with Refreshment  3:45pm – 5pm Teaching and MeditationConducted in English with Mandarin translation.  Everyone welcome. No previous experience required.Suggested donation:  1. NT$500 for Saturday 24 Dec OR Sunday 25 Dec  2. NT$800 for both Saturday 24 Dec AND Sunday 25 Dec  Click here to book.Venue: Manjughosha Buddhist Center 1F, No. 2-1, Lane 77, Sec. 1 Hangzhou South Road, Taipei  ( The closest MRT stations: Shandao Temple station exit 5 or Dongmen station exit 1 or 2)  Click here for map.Inquiry:[masked] / [masked]Website: www.meditationtw.org/events/mindfulness-and-concentration-weekend-workshop-sat-sun-dec[masked]pfacebook: www.facebook.com/meditationtaipei

title: 台中 なぜ生きる 日語學習會 Meetup
location: 淨土真宗台中講堂 - 台中市精誠18街33號1樓, Taichung
description: 用日語佛教書「なぜ生きる」和這書的翻成中文版「人，為何而生，為何而活」，學習人生的意義。這本書是作為挽救最多生命的書，在日本突破８８萬部。   參加條件：能讀日語五十音。日語的部分都有翻譯。基本上按照參加的人的情況進行。但是解釋時用中文説明比較多，所以建議會聼懂中文或日語的人參加比較好。請把握輕鬆練習日語的機會~。     時 間：９：３０～１２：００ 　１３：３０～１６：００  （９：３０～９：５０　１３：３０～１３：５０　有勤行（做課時間）之後開始講師的課）  　只有參加半天也可   講師：早田 講師   翻譯：石村賢治 先生    費用：隨喜布施  地點：淨土真宗 台中講堂　http://srk.org.tw/            台中市精誠18街33號1樓TEL：[masked]               E-mail：[masked]

host: Global Adventurers Asia Taipei 台北 國際 朋友
title: Fun with Badminton and Friends
Python Study Group for Beginners
location: Syntrend 11F - 台北市市民大道三段二號, Taipei
description: 課程簡介Python 是一門強調簡潔、易讀、也因此能夠快速學習的程式語言，並可以用於開發網站、桌面應用程式、自動化測試、產品原型、科學研究、嵌入式設備等領域。不僅適合初學者作為第一門程式語言，由淺入深地學習電腦科學；也適合作為資深開發者的第二語言，成為強而有力的輔助工具。這門課程將會融合基礎電腦科學、搭配大量程式範例和務實的開發練習，帶領學員打下扎實的基礎知識。並透過互動式的課程設計與學習工具，一層一層地的深入每個主題。同時也會介紹真實世界中常用的套件，為實戰做好準備。整門課程可以讓學員利用最少的時間掌握最完備的知識體系。課程時間這門課程內容豐富，會拆成 8 次上課，讓學員充分吸收。會於 12/7–1/25 的每週三 7:00–9:30 PM 上課，前 30 分鐘為交流時間。建議盡可能連續參加避免跟不上喔。課程大綱EnvironmentIntroduction — Python 是個什麼樣的程式語言：能做什麼、為什麼要學Setup — 設定 Python 開發環境，安裝必要套件“Hello Python!” — 撰寫一支最簡單的 Python 程式及了解運作方式General Programming TopicsData Type and Control Flow I — 介紹程式設計基本工具箱：資料型別與流程控制基礎與實做Data Type and Control Flow II — 在基礎上介紹更多 Python 資料型別與流程控制及基礎例外處理與實做Function — 使用函數模組化：函數的基礎概念、在 Python 的用法與實做Built-In Functions — 介紹常用內建函數IO and File — 與外部互動：基礎輸入輸出與檔案Methods of String — 介紹常用字串方法The Challenges: Find the Largest File & Find the Largest Directory — 實做練習：找最大的檔案與資料夾Fascinating Programming Topics in PythonGenerator and Comprehensions — 介紹快速建構容器內容與簡化程式的 Python 語法：產生器與理解式Functional Tools — 介紹 Python 中函數式程式設計的工具Module and Package — 進一步模組化：建立模組與套件與安裝第三方套件Useful Packages — 站在巨人的肩膀上：常用內建、第三方套件介紹，如 os, collections, json, requests, … 等等Object-oriented Programming — Python 的物件導向程式設計A Mini Project: Web Crawler — 實做迷你專案：網頁爬蟲 Coach Mosky: Mosky is Python Charmer at Pinkoi, works with colleagues to build the best online marketplace for unique gifts, and has love for Python and open source. She is teaching Python, working on Python projects, like Clime and MoSQL, and has shared at PyCons, COSCUPs, TEDxNTUST in Taiwan, and PyCons in Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Korea. More: mosky.tw *全程免費，謝謝Mosky教練願意帶領Python讀書會並自編課程，也謝謝台灣新創競技場（ＴＳＳ）的飲食贊助，三創育成基金會（Star Rocket)的場地贊助，請大家7:00入場吃點東西聊聊天認識大家，正式課程7:30開始。

title: Python Study Group for Beginners
location: Syntrend 11F - 台北市市民大道三段二號, Taipei
description: 課程簡介Python 是一門強調簡潔、易讀、也因此能夠快速學習的程式語言，並可以用於開發網站、桌面應用程式、自動化測試、產品原型、科學研究、嵌入式設備等領域。不僅適合初學者作為第一門程式語言，由淺入深地學習電腦科學；也適合作為資深開發者的第二語言，成為強而有力的輔助工具。這門課程將會融合基礎電腦科學、搭配大量程式範例和務實的開發練習，帶領學員打下扎實的基礎知識。並透過互動式的課程設計與學習工具，一層一層地的深入每個主題。同時也會介紹真實世界中常用的套件，為實戰做好準備。整門課程可以讓學員利用最少的時間掌握最完備的知識體系。課程時間這門課程內容豐富，會拆成 8 次上課，讓學員充分吸收。會於 12/7–1/25 的每週三 7:00–9:30 PM 上課，前 30 分鐘為交流時間。建議盡可能連續參加避免跟不上喔。課程大綱EnvironmentIntroduction — Python 是個什麼樣的程式語言：能做什麼、為什麼要學Setup — 設定 Python 開發環境，安裝必要套件“Hello Python!” — 撰寫一支最簡單的 Python 程式及了解運作方式General Programming TopicsData Type and Control Flow I — 介紹程式設計基本工具箱：資料型別與流程控制基礎與實做Data Type and Control Flow II — 在基礎上介紹更多 Python 資料型別與流程控制及基礎例外處理與實做Function — 使用函數模組化：函數的基礎概念、在 Python 的用法與實做Built-In Functions — 介紹常用內建函數IO and File — 與外部互動：基礎輸入輸出與檔案Methods of String — 介紹常用字串方法The Challenges: Find the Largest File & Find the Largest Directory — 實做練習：找最大的檔案與資料夾Fascinating Programming Topics in PythonGenerator and Comprehensions — 介紹快速建構容器內容與簡化程式的 Python 語法：產生器與理解式Functional Tools — 介紹 Python 中函數式程式設計的工具Module and Package — 進一步模組化：建立模組與套件與安裝第三方套件Useful Packages — 站在巨人的肩膀上：常用內建、第三方套件介紹，如 os, collections, json, requests, … 等等Object-oriented Programming — Python 的物件導向程式設計A Mini Project: Web Crawler — 實做迷你專案：網頁爬蟲 Coach Mosky: Mosky is Python Charmer at Pinkoi, works with colleagues to build the best online marketplace for unique gifts, and has love for Python and open source. She is teaching Python, working on Python projects, like Clime and MoSQL, and has shared at PyCons, COSCUPs, TEDxNTUST in Taiwan, and PyCons in Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Korea. More: mosky.tw *全程免費，謝謝Mosky教練願意帶領Python讀書會並自編課程，也謝謝台灣新創競技場（ＴＳＳ）的飲食贊助，三創育成基金會（Star Rocket)的場地贊助，請大家7:00入場吃點東西聊聊天認識大家，正式課程7:30開始。

title: Data Analytics 新手村: 使用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 完成資料分析與預測!
location: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場)  - 北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場) , Taipei
description: Data Analytics 新手村: 使用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 完成資料分析與預測!  傳統的數據分析，讓你預知未來，而機器學習可以讓你改變未來。  本次課程將分成兩天進行，將帶領 女生們一起實作出預測模型，請報名學員務必兩天都參加喔！ 報名連結: 報到排序會依據此名單https://www.wetogether.co/event_detail_46 (限女性參加, 需自備電腦) 1/17 (Tue) 19:00 - 21:00: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning 介紹與 Demo  1/24 (Tue) 19:00 - 21:00: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning 學員實作 上課地點: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場) 注意: 報名此活動，表示您兩場皆可出席。 現場會提供 Azure 帳號供學員學習使用, 本課程以有「基礎演算法」概念的學員為佳, 而課程中會簡單介紹 Azure 機器學習演算法的種類, 學員若有興趣可以先參考 >> https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-tw/azure/machine-learning/machine-learning-algorithm-choice#機器學習的類型 報名連結: https://www.wetogether.co/event_detail_46

title: Python Study Group for Beginners
location: Syntrend 11F - 台北市市民大道三段二號, Taipei
description: 課程簡介Python 是一門強調簡潔、易讀、也因此能夠快速學習的程式語言，並可以用於開發網站、桌面應用程式、自動化測試、產品原型、科學研究、嵌入式設備等領域。不僅適合初學者作為第一門程式語言，由淺入深地學習電腦科學；也適合作為資深開發者的第二語言，成為強而有力的輔助工具。這門課程將會融合基礎電腦科學、搭配大量程式範例和務實的開發練習，帶領學員打下扎實的基礎知識。並透過互動式的課程設計與學習工具，一層一層地的深入每個主題。同時也會介紹真實世界中常用的套件，為實戰做好準備。整門課程可以讓學員利用最少的時間掌握最完備的知識體系。課程時間這門課程內容豐富，會拆成 8 次上課，讓學員充分吸收。會於 12/7–1/25 的每週三 7:00–9:30 PM 上課，前 30 分鐘為交流時間。建議盡可能連續參加避免跟不上喔。課程大綱EnvironmentIntroduction — Python 是個什麼樣的程式語言：能做什麼、為什麼要學Setup — 設定 Python 開發環境，安裝必要套件“Hello Python!” — 撰寫一支最簡單的 Python 程式及了解運作方式General Programming TopicsData Type and Control Flow I — 介紹程式設計基本工具箱：資料型別與流程控制基礎與實做Data Type and Control Flow II — 在基礎上介紹更多 Python 資料型別與流程控制及基礎例外處理與實做Function — 使用函數模組化：函數的基礎概念、在 Python 的用法與實做Built-In Functions — 介紹常用內建函數IO and File — 與外部互動：基礎輸入輸出與檔案Methods of String — 介紹常用字串方法The Challenges: Find the Largest File & Find the Largest Directory — 實做練習：找最大的檔案與資料夾Fascinating Programming Topics in PythonGenerator and Comprehensions — 介紹快速建構容器內容與簡化程式的 Python 語法：產生器與理解式Functional Tools — 介紹 Python 中函數式程式設計的工具Module and Package — 進一步模組化：建立模組與套件與安裝第三方套件Useful Packages — 站在巨人的肩膀上：常用內建、第三方套件介紹，如 os, collections, json, requests, … 等等Object-oriented Programming — Python 的物件導向程式設計A Mini Project: Web Crawler — 實做迷你專案：網頁爬蟲 Coach Mosky: Mosky is Python Charmer at Pinkoi, works with colleagues to build the best online marketplace for unique gifts, and has love for Python and open source. She is teaching Python, working on Python projects, like Clime and MoSQL, and has shared at PyCons, COSCUPs, TEDxNTUST in Taiwan, and PyCons in Japan, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Korea. More: mosky.tw *全程免費，謝謝Mosky教練願意帶領Python讀書會並自編課程，也謝謝台灣新創競技場（ＴＳＳ）的飲食贊助，三創育成基金會（Star Rocket)的場地贊助，請大家7:00入場吃點東西聊聊天認識大家，正式課程7:30開始。

host: Taiwan R User Group / MLDM Monday
title: MLDM Monday X Quantitative Trading Strategy Mining Study Group
location: 資策會數位教育研究所 - 大安區信義路三段153號3樓, Taipei
description: - TBA - Free Discuss & Coding為了讓與會的大眾可以盡情的交流自己的想法與策略！本系列之活動嚴禁錄音錄影！也不會提供線上會後影片！感謝大家的支持與包含！

title: Data Analytics 新手村: 使用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 完成資料分析與預測!(2/2)
location: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場)  - 北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場) , Taipei
description: Data Analytics 新手村: 使用機器學習 (Machine Learning) 完成資料分析與預測!  傳統的數據分析，讓你預知未來，而機器學習可以讓你改變未來。  本次課程將分成兩天進行，將帶領女生們一起實作出預測模型，請報名學員務必兩天都參加喔！ (限女性參加, 需自備電腦) 1/17 (Tue) 19:00 - 21:00: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning 介紹與 Demo  1/24 (Tue) 19:00 - 21:00: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning 學員實作 上課地點: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號19F (國泰置地廣場) 注意: 報名此活動，表示您兩場皆可出席。 現場會提供 Azure 帳號供學員學習使用, 本課程以有「基礎演算法」概念的學員為佳, 而課程中會簡單介紹 Azure 機器學習演算法的種類, 學員若有興趣可以先參考 >> https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-tw/azure/machine-learning/machine-learning-algorithm-choice#機器學習的類型 報名連結: (報到順序會依據此名單）https://www.wetogether.co/event_detail_46
